peters_algorithm.base.asset_parsing.mujoco_loader module¶

class peters_algorithm.base.asset_parsing.mujoco_loader.MujocoLoader(*, config_file: dict, xml_dir: str)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to load mujoco objects as dictionary

_get_mujoco_dict(obj_dict: dict)[source]¶

Loads xml and parses with Parser class to mjcf and combines all information to a mujoco-object

Parameters:

obj_dict (dict) – Contains information about world_container objects

Returns:

Dictionary of world_container objects as mujoco-objects

Return type:

mujoco_dict (dict)

_get_object_infos()[source]¶

Handles config file structure

Returns:

Contains information about world_container objects

static _read_params(params: list)[source]¶

Helper function to read object specific parameters set in config file

Parameters:

params (list(dict)) – List of world_container object specific parameters given as dictionary

Returns:

Type of world_container-object; relates to mujoco-object parameter attachable (bool): True if object can be attached to a container-type object; relates to mujoco-object parameter

Return type:

obj_type (str)

get_mujoco_objects()[source]¶

Calls class functions to get and return dictionary of mujoco-objects

Returns:

World objects defined in config are loaded and wrapped in mujoco-object

Return type:
